a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: PISA: Mean performance on the reading scale, by sex, 2015
Average score of 15-year-old students on the PISA reading scale. The metric for the overall reading scale is based
on a mean for participating OECD countries set at 500, with a standard deviation of 100.
PISA: Mean performance on the reading scale. Male
PISA: Mean performance on the reading scale. Female
Data source: OECD Programme for International Student Assessment (PISA)
